name: Society for Arts and Technology (SAT)
description: Technological tools for creativity and industry

projects.project_name: Compute-Agnostic Compilation of Audio and Media Processing Objects for FPGA Acceleration
projects.summary: Develop a compilation system for audio and media processing that is agnostic to the computing platform, enabling acceleration with FPGA devices.

projects.project_name: Exploration of Advanced Rendering Pipelines in ossia score with Raytracing for Fulldome Content
projects.summary: Investigate and implement advanced rendering pipelines using raytracing techniques for creating fulldome visual content in ossia score.

projects.project_name: GPU-Independent Pipeline for Large-Scale Point Cloud and Gaussian Splat Rendering
projects.summary: Create a rendering pipeline that can handle large point clouds and Gaussian splats, ensuring compatibility across different GPU architectures.

projects.project_name: GPU rendering for the score GUI
projects.summary: Implement GPU-based rendering techniques for improving the graphical user interface of the ossia score software.
Develop a content management library that assists users in organizing and handling media content efficiently.

projects.project_name: CLAP Audio Plug-in Integration in ossia score
projects.summary: Integrate CLAP audio plugin support into the ossia score environment to enhance its audio processing capabilities.

projects.project_name: A cross-platform API for GPU texture sharing
projects.summary: Create an API that allows for shared GPU textures across different platforms, facilitating better collaboration in graphics applications.
Enhance tools and features for collaborative and interactive scoring applications, focusing on distributed environments.
Develop a C++ implementation for media transmission over QUIC, optimizing data transmission in multimedia applications.

projects.project_name: Object Detection on Point Cloud Streams
projects.summary: Create an object detection system that processes streaming data from point clouds for real-time analysis and interaction.

projects.project_name: Porting Puara-gestures to Avendish and creating ossia score objects for each gestural descriptor
projects.summary: Adapt the Puara-gestures functionality to work with the Avendish system, creating relevant objects in ossia score where necessary.

projects.project_name: Adding custom Satellite features to the hubs blender add-on
projects.summary: Extend the capabilities of the hubs blender add-on by adding specialized features for Satellite systems, enhancing user experience.
